Detailed Description

IndexGenerator - generates data structures necessary for building the actualy index.

Member Function Documentation

◆ create_index_generator()

static std::unique_ptr<IndexGenerator> claragenomics::IndexGenerator::create_index_generator ( const std::string &  query_filename,
std::uint64_t  kmer_length,
std::uint64_t  window_size 
)
static

create and return an IndexGenerator object

Given one or more sequences generates an in-memory mapping of (k,w)-kmer-representations and all occurences of skatch elelemtns with that representation

Parameters
query_filenamefilepath to reads in FASTA or FASTQ format
kmer_lengthk - the kmer lenght
window_sizew - the length of the sliding window
Returns
IndexGenerator implementation, generates representation - sketch elements mapping
